name: Kingdom Defender (ThatsNotMeCZ)
description:
Prototype of tower defense game. How long can you defend your castle in this endless mode? Desktop support only, for now.

I really appreciate every feedback..


Game controls

Camera movement - W,A,S,D
Zoom and rotation- mouse wheel

Known bugs
  • Sometimes game freezes when loading new game, pause and resume to fix this.
  • UI way too big on fullscreen
  • On recalculating path sometimes white sphere appears next to player castle
  • Music is not playing from game start
